param.name: load_mpi
param.label: Command to load MPI
param.help: To load the environment, enter the appropriate command, for example: module load module-name or source path/to/env.sh.

param.name: resource
param.label: Resource
param.help: Choose the resource for script submission

param.name: jobschedulertype
param.label: Select Controller, SLURM Partition or PBS Queue
param.help: Job will submitted using SSH, sbatch or qsub, respectively

param.name: wait_for_job
param.label: Wait for the SLURM job or fire and forget?
param.help: If yes is selected, the PW job waits for the SLURM job to complete while continuously monitoring its status and the possibility to cancel the SLURM job when the PW job is canceled.

param.name: script_text
param.label: Type your script
param.help: Type or copy paste the script that is submitted to the selected resource

param.name: wait_for_job
param.label: Wait for the PBS job or fire and forget?
param.help: If yes is selected, the PW job waits for the PBS job to complete while continuously monitoring its status and the possibility to cancel the PBS job when the PW job is canceled.
